title: Angular Pipe Options Schema
description: Creates a new generic pipe definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the pipe?

path.description: The path at which to create the pipe, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true (the default) creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new pipe.

skipImport.description: When true, does not import this pipe into the owning NgModule.

export.description: When true, the declaring NgModule exports this pipe.

lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the pipe.
